column4: =/ I need to intall glib2.5 or higher, but apparently the highest glib is 2.26 via the repos?
Or, atleast, when going apt-get install libglib2.0
Please tell me you're not THAT far behind
It's like dependancy hell INSIDE UBUNTU
Apparently it needs glib-2.0 -- When I have 2.26
start from the beginning.  Why do you think you need this version of glib?
you need -dev packages to compile things
erm, because users do not usually need to compile things
then tell your configure script to stop being silly?
Wish I could. 'Tis bein' very rude.
packages seems old.  Actually seems to have been packaged in debian and now gone.  You can try to fetch the source package from debian but it seems like deps are just gone now (like libgtkhtml-2.0)
